## Quality Review

### Slide 1 - Attention-Grabbing Opener ✓
- **Status:** PASS
- **Strengths:**
  - Bold, eye-catching design with forest green background
  - Gold map pin icon prominently featured
  - Clean text hierarchy: "WHERE TO DONATE" / "RIGHT NOW"
  - Gold sparkle effects create festive feel
  - KannaKrew logo in top-left corner
- **Notes:**
  - Text is clear and readable
  - Cannabis leaf incorporated in map pin design
  - Bottom text "4 Locations Live Across the Valley" present

### Slide 2 - Gold Canyon Location ✓
- **Status:** PASS
- **Strengths:**
  - Clean white card with gold border
  - Realistic donation box filled with toys (great visual)
  - "GINZA RESTAURANT" in forest green (excellent brand colors)
  - Address clearly displayed
  - Red "Box Available Now" badge prominent
  - Map pin icon in top-right corner
- **Notes:**
  - Professional, approachable aesthetic
  - Easy to read at a glance

### Slide 3 - Tempe & Apache Junction Locations ✓
- **Status:** PASS
- **Strengths:**
  - Effective split-screen design with gold divider
  - "FANCY PETS" logo with pet-themed graphics
  - "AMRAHLYNN'S COLLECTIBLES" with treasure/coin theme
  - Both locations have map pins and addresses
  - "MORE LOCATIONS" banner at top in forest green
  - "LIVE NOW" gold badges on both sides
- **Notes:**
  - Balanced, symmetrical layout
  - Both businesses represented with brand-appropriate aesthetics

### Slide 4 - Glendale + Coming Dec 1 Tease ✓
- **Status:** PASS
- **Strengths:**
  - Diagonal split creates visual interest
  - Top: "LEVEL UP SMOKE SHOP" with realistic storefront photo
  - "LOCATION #4" badge in forest green
  - Bottom: Dark green teaser section with KannaKlaus silhouette
  - Alert icon and "DEC 1 ANNOUNCEMENT" in gold
  - "9+ More Locations Coming" creates anticipation
  - "Stay tuned..." adds mystery
- **Notes:**
  - KannaKlaus silhouette adds brand consistency
  - Teaser builds excitement for Dec 1 Nirvana announcement

## Technical Specs

**Dimensions:** 1024x1024px (generated)
**Expected:** 1080x1080px
**Note:** Minor size difference (1024 vs 1080) - acceptable for Instagram, can be resized if needed

**Format:** PNG
**Color Profile:** RGB
**Quality:** High resolution, crisp text, no artifacts

### Ready for Posting
All 4 slides are ready for immediate use on Instagram/Facebook/TikTok.

### Optional Enhancements
- If needed, resize images from 1024x1024 to 1080x1080 (minor adjustment)

### Caption Recommendation
Use caption from `POST_03_CAPTION.md` (if created) or draft one emphasizing:
- 4 locations currently live
- Easy to donate (drop off at any location)
- 9+ more locations coming December 1st
- Every toy goes to Sojourner Center
- Tag all businesses hosting boxes

## Generation Method

**System:** Visual-Creator Subagent (via OpenRouter API)
**Workflow:**
1. Content Parser extracted design specs from `POST_03_DESIGN_SPECS.md`
2. Prompt Engineer optimized prompts for Gemini 2.5 Flash Image
3. Generator called OpenRouter API for each slide
4. Reviewer performed automated quality checks (V0 - basic validation)
5. Coordinator saved all approved images

**Script:** `generate_slides.py` (reusable for future posts)
